name: Black Hole Escape (palicron)
description:
Black hole Escape is a game base where you try to escape the black holes hunger, using blocks and your ability to retrieve a battery and place it on the battery bay,

using the battery you can active the teleporter t the next level.

the faster you move the easy is the level. the black hole not only pulls you if you get near it will start eating the space of the level until nothing is left.

Controls 

AWSD to move 

E to grab objects 

Shift to dash

Space to Jump 

Esc to pause menu

Left-click to launch objects
